software.name: 3D Construction Kit
software.Description: You can design a car, house, aeroplane (or whatever you want!) and then walk around it. See what it looks like from any angle. Change it. Add color, detail, animation. The possibilities are endless. And it's ideal for creating games. If you're not artistic, don't worry - there are lots of objects already included in the kit for you to use in your plans, but it's simple to create your own if you want. So, if you enjoy playing games, but want to use your computer's real capabilities for a change, this is a perfect opportunity.

software.Genre: Sports > Individual > Combat > Boxing / Martial Arts

software.name: Alone in the Dark
software.Description: A suspicious suicide. A chilling curse. A malevolent power. And a wicked dark secret. This is Derceto, legendary Louisiana mansion - where, against your better judgement, you're drawn into a world of shadows to explore the darker side of Jeremy Hartwood's imagination. Despite a paralyzing sense of personal danger, your quest for truth drives you to investigate the old house. But, you didn't know that by entering Derceto, you'd be plunged into the daily nightmare that was Jeremy Hartwood's life. You weren't prepared for the torturous howls that resound from deep within its halls. You didn't foresee the shadowy corridors that seemingly have no end. You couldn't anticipate the brooding, gloom-filled rooms, the pervasive weight of dread, the heavy sense of evil that fills the atmosphere and teh very house itself. Had you known, you might have refused your task. But alas, you accepted, and now you must make your way through this spine-tingling adventure alone... and in the dark.

software.name: Ankh: The Tales of Mystery
software.Description: Ankh: The Tales of Mystery is an Action game, developed by Artex Software and published by R-Comp, which was released in Europe in 1998.

software.name: Apocalypse
software.Description: Apocalypse is an Action game, developed and published by 4th Dimension, which was released in Europe in 1990.

software.name: Asylum
software.Description: Asylum is an Action game, developed and published by Digital Psychosis, which was released in Europe in 1993.

software.name: Battle Chess
software.Description: An entire medieval world at war on the checkered field! Only Battle Chess combines a magnificent chess logic system with colorful and dramatic 3D animations. Featuring 10 levels of play and an opening library of 30,000 moves challenging the most sophisticated players. Play against the computer or your friend or let the computer play against itself.

software.name: Birds of War
software.Description: Birds of War is a Simulation game, developed and published by 4th Dimension, which was released in Europe in 1993.

software.name: Blitz
software.Description: Blitz is an Action game, developed and published by Arxe Systems, which was released in Europe in 1991.

software.name: Bobby Blockhead vs. The Dark Planet
software.Description: Bobby Blockhead vs. The Dark Planet is an Action game, developed and published by Atomic Software, which was released in Europe in 1991.

Release.name: Bobby Blockhead vs. The Dark Planet

software.name: Break 147
software.Description: Break 147 is a Sports game, developed and published by 4th Dimension, which was released in Europe in 1991.

software.name: Bug Hunter / Moondash
software.Description: Bug Hunter: Bug hunter 'Hysteron Proteron' not the eight foot killing machine designed but a six inch biped with a large mouth and an irrational dislike for insects. Can this mutant reject show its value as an insect exterminator? Work your way through the house dropping objects on the bugs to kill them. Don't forget that with your suckered feet walls are no object! Moon Dash: Out testing a new planet ranger ship you run into hundreds of alien Judhs on their way to destroy the earth colon Kamkol 4. You are attacked but manage to escape. Your radio is out of action but can you get safely back through 16 zones before the aliens to warn the city of the impending attack.

software.name: Bug Hunter In Space
software.Description: Bug Hunter In Space is a Puzzle game, developed and published by Minerva, which was released in Europe in 1990.

software.name: Burn Out
software.Description: Burn Out is a Racing game, developed and published by Oregan Software Developments, which was released in Europe in 1995.

software.name: Cadaver
software.Description: Cadaver is an Action Adventure game, developed and published by The Bitmap Brothers, which was released in Europe in 1990.

software.name: Cadaver: The Payoff
software.Description: Cadaver: The Payoff is an Action Adventure game, developed and published by The Bitmap Brothers, which was released in Europe in 1991.

software.name: Cannon Fodder
software.Description: Cannon Fodder is a Strategy game, developed by Sensible Software and published by Krisalis Software, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Cataclysm
software.Description: Cataclysm is a Puzzle game, developed and published by 4th Dimension, which was released in Europe in 1991.

software.name: Chaos Engine, The
software.Description: Sometime during the last century, an experimenter with time, space and early computers created a bizarre machine. The inventor's name was Baron Fortesque. The machine was... The Chaos Engine. Although primitive, the machine became incredibly powerful and went crazy, turning ordinary humans and household pets into razor-toothed, armor-plated killing machines. Enter 6 hard-nailed mercenaries for hire. These ball-breakers are armed to the teeth with over 25 weapons and a host of special destructive devices specific to their class. Select 2 characters to form your party and enter the World of Chaos. The sprawling adventure covers 4 graphic worlds and 16 levels loaded with fiendish traps, puzzles and secret passages. Get your hands on sawn-off shotguns, molotov cocktails and a huge amount of armament, and buy, blag or blast your way through hordes of different monsters to do battle with the ultimate killing machine, THE CHAOS ENGINE!

software.name: Chess 3D
software.Description: Chess 3D is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Micro Power, which was released in Europe in 1991.

software.name: Chocks Away
software.Description: Chocks Away is a Simulation game, developed and published by 4th Dimension, which was released in Europe in 1990.

software.name: Chuck Rock
software.Description: Chuck Rock hasn't been the same since his long-time rival in love, the evil Gary Gritter, kidnapped his wife, the beautiful Ophelia. Help Chuck in his quest to rescure Ophelia from the clutches of the evil Gary. Kick, throw rocks and belly-butt your way through a multitude of comical zones featuring 500 screens of exciting and addictive gameplay.

software.name: Corruption
software.Description: Power. Profit. Double-dealing and deceit. The name of the game is Corruption. It's a fast-paced thriller, a battle of wits and wills like nothing you've ever played. With extraordinary graphics and an amazing vocabulary, it's illustrated interactive fiction at its best! Compelling adventure tests your skill at manipulating characters and extracting information to solve the puzzle. Expansive vocabulary lets you interact with over 15 characters in everyday language. Powerful graphics reflecting the financial world and underworld of London.

software.name: Crystal Maze, The
software.Description: The Crystal Maze is a Puzzle game, developed and published by Sherston Software, which was released in Europe in 1993.

software.name: Cycloids
software.Description: Cycloids is an Action game, developed by Software 42 and published by Eclipse, which was released in Europe in 1993.

software.name: DarkWood
software.Description: DarkWood is an Action game, developed and published by Eclipse, which was released in Europe in 1995.

software.name: Deeva
software.Description: Deeva is an Action game, developed and published by Calderglen Computers Ltd, which was released in Europe in 1990.

software.name: Descent
software.Description: Welcome to Descent™ - 30 levels of the most mind-bending, stomach-churning action game ever. Featuring true 3-Dimensional worlds with light source shading, texture mapping, 3-D morphing, directional sound effects and sizzling music, this is technology taken to the limit. You begin deep below the surface of Lunar Base I where on unknown alien race has taken over the chasm of the Post-Terran Mining Corporation. Lunge straight down mine shafts, twist around never-ending tunnels and fight your way past robotic menaces in an environment that's truly 360° 3-D... move up, move down shoot everything everywhere. Hang onto your senses (and your lunch) as you drop straight down mine shafts on a ride that'll leave you spinning. And what's the good of losing your mind if you can't share the experience with your friends? Descent invites you and your buddies to dive into the action together with head-to-head combat and cooperative two-player modem and eight-player network support.

software.name: Descent II
software.Description: Descent II is an Action game, developed by Parallax Software and published by Interplay, which was released in Europe in 1996.

software.name: Diggers
software.Description: Diggers is a Puzzle game, developed and published by Millenium Interactive, which was released in Europe in 1993.

software.name: Doom
software.Description: All Hell has run amok! Monstrous demons from another dimension use their gruesome talents to turn your space station into a blood-splattered slaughterhouse.

software.name: Doom +
software.Description: Doom + is an Action game, developed by id Software and published by R-Comp, which was released in Europe in 1998.

software.name: Drifer
software.Description: Drifer is a Racing game, developed and published by 4th Dimension, which was released in Europe in 1997.

software.name: Drop Ship
software.Description: Drop Ship is an Action game, developed and published by 4th Dimension, which was released in Europe in 1990.

software.name: Dune II: The Battle for Arrakis
software.Description: Dune II: The Battle for Arrakis is a Strategy game, developed by 7th ARM Systems and published by Eclipse, which was released in Europe in 1995.

Release.name: Dune II: The Battle for Arrakis

software.name: Dungeon, The
software.Description: The Dungeon is a Role-Playing game, developed and published by 4th Dimension, which was released in Europe in 1993.

software.name: E-Type
software.Description: E-Type is a Racing game, developed and published by 4th Dimension, which was released in Europe in 1989.

software.name: E-Type 2
software.Description: E-Type 2 is a Racing game, developed and published by 4th Dimension, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Elite
software.Description: Command your Cobra spaceship in a fantastic voyage of discovery and adventure, a supreme test of your combat , navigational and entrepreneurial skills. Trade between countless planets, using the proceeds to equip your ship with heat-seeking missiles, beam lasers and other weapons - corporate states can be approached without risk, but unruly anarchies may be swarming with space pirates. Black market trading can be lucrative but could result in skirmishes with local police and a price on your head! However you make your money, by fair means or foul, you must blast onwards through space annihilating pirate ships and hostile aliens as you strive to earn your reputation as one of the Elite!

software.name: Enigma
software.Description: Enigma is a Puzzle game, developed by Trax Software and published by Archimedes World, which was released in Europe in 1992.

software.name: Enter The Realm
software.Description: Enter The Realm is an Action game, developed and published by 4th Dimension, which was released in Europe in 1991.

software.name: Fireball II
software.Description: Fireball II is an Action game, developed and published by Cambridge International Software, which was released in Europe in 1990.

software.name: Fish!
software.Description: Fish! is an Adventure game, developed and published by Magnetic Scrolls Ltd., which was released in Europe in 1990.

software.name: Flashback
software.Description: Planet Titan: Brave mutants, robots, anti-matter fields and the primitive inhabitants as you find your way through the jungle. New Washington: First recover your memory, then go undercover to earn money. Finally, buy a false ID if you want to sneak back on Earth. Death Tower: Climb the 8 floors of the Death Tower labyrinth. Avoid the deadly Replicants and win a free ticket to Earth. Earth: Big trouble! The authorities have discovered your false ID and send robot cops to capture you. Paradise Club: You discovered the aliens' plans, but somehow end up being captured and mysteriously transported through space. Planet Morphs: You materialized on their home planet. Now all you have to do is destroy the Morphs and live to tell about it!

software.name: Flashback: The Quest for Identity
software.Description: Planet Titan: Brave mutants, robots, anti-matter fields and the primitive inhabitants as you find your way through the jungle. New Washington: First recover your memory, then go undercover to earn money. Finally, buy a false ID if you want to sneak back on Earth. Death Tower: Climb the 8 floors of the Death Tower labyrinth. Avoid the deadly Replicants and win a free ticket to Earth. Earth: Big trouble! The authorities have discovered your false ID and send robot cops to capture you. Paradise Club: You discovered the aliens' plans, but somehow end up being captured and mysteriously transported through space. Planet Morphs: You materialized on their home planet. Now all you have to do is destroy the Morphs and live to tell about it!

software.name: Gods
software.Description: A city lost in legend. An unconquered warrior seeking reward. A challenge laid down by the Gods. Taking the role of Hercules in the ultimate arcade adventure, you must scour the depths of an ancient city in your search for the great prize of immortality. Featuring 15 different weapon systems, 20 different potions and power-ups, and a host of intelligent monsters. Have you got what it takes to be a GOD?

software.name: Gorm
software.Description: Gorm is an Adventure game, developed and published by Arcimedes World, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Grevious Bodily 'Arm
software.Description: Grevious Bodily 'Arm is an Action game, published by 4th Dimension, which was released in Europe in 1992.

software.Description: Guile is an Action game, developed and published by Dream, which was released in Europe in 1992.

software.name: Hamsters
software.Description: Hamsters is an Action game, developed by GamesWare and published by Eclipse, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Haunted House
software.Description: Haunted House is an Adventure game, developed and published by 4th Dimension, which was released in Europe in 2005.

software.name: HeroQuest
software.Description: HeroQuest, the best-selling role playing game has now been developed into an absorbing fantasy adventure game for your computer. Take up the challenge to become a Hero and enter the underground realm of the evil wizard Morcar. But beware, the unlit tunnels hold many dangers - terrible monsters, deadly traps and mysterious rooms.

software.name: Hostages
software.Description: Hostages is an Action game, developed by Infogrames and published by Superior Software, which was released in Europe in 1988.

software.name: Ibix the Viking
software.Description: Ibix the Viking is an Action Adventure game, developed and published by Minerva, which was released in Europe in 1990.

software.name: Inertia
software.Description: Inertia is an Action game, developed and published by 4th Dimension, which was released in Europe in 1990.

software.name: Interdictor
software.Description: Interdictor is a Simulation game, developed by Simis Ltd. and published by Clares Micro Supplies, which was released in Europe in 1989.

software.name: Iron Lord
software.Description: Iron Lord is a Strategy game, developed by Ubisoft and published by Cygnus, which was released in Europe in 1990.

software.name: Ixion
software.Description: Ixion is an Action game, developed by Software 42 and published by Eclipse, which was released in Europe in 1992.

software.name: James Pond
software.Description: When oceans are threatened, only Pond has the guts to save the day! From plugging oil tankers to rescuing mermaids, no mission is too dangerous. He's fearless, he's daring, he's ozone friendly!

software.name: Jet Fighter
software.Description: Jet Fighter is an Action game, developed and published by Minerva, which was released in Europe in 1988.

software.name: Jinxter
software.Description: Just when a man thinks his luck is running out, things start getting even worse. He gets run over by a bus. Sprayed with cheese sandwich by a supernatural being. Smashed against a tunnel by a speeding train. He gets incinerated, widdled on, folded, bent, spindled, mutilated and generally mucked about with. And in return? He gets the leading role in a perplexing, hilarious race against time and chance, set in a jinxed land menaced by the impending death of good fortune. Look on the bright side - it could be your luckiest move yet. Don't expect tiresome trolls, obvious orcs, silly spells and wet, wimpish witches in JINXTER. Infuriating, enchanting, absurd and hilarious by turns, JINXTER will surprise you with every move you make. But don't forget: every silver lining has a cloud.

software.name: Last Ninja, The
software.Description: The Last Ninja is an Action game, developed by System 3 and published by Superior Software, which was released in Europe in 1989.

software.name: Lemmings 2
software.Description: Lemmings 2 is a Puzzle game, developed by DMA Design and published by Krisalis Software, which was released in Europe in 1991.

software.name: Lotus Turbo Challenge 2
software.Description: Lotus Turbo Challenge 2 is a Racing game, developed by Magnetic Fields and published by Krisalis Software, which was released in Europe in 1992.

software.name: Mad Professor Mariarti
software.Description: Mad Professor Mariarti is an Action game, developed and published by Krisalis Software, which was released in Europe in 1990.

software.name: Magic Pockets
software.Description: Magic Pockets is arcade-style action at its best. Featuring stacks of levels to play through, heaps of weapons to attack with, swarms of intelligent nasties to battle, bonus games, secret rooms, and loads and loads of power-ups! Can you handle the fast and furious action of Magic Pockets?

software.name: Manchester United Europe
software.Description: Manchester United Europe takes this world famous club into the European arena of club knockout competitions. Featuring a 4-player option, full goalkeeper control, new control method incorporating one touch football and aftertouch, substitutions, yellow and red cards, sending off, action replays, player statistics in competition, saved game options, penalty shoot-outs in cup competition, arcade-only option and management-only option or full simulation option.

software.name: Marsquake
software.Description: Marsquake is a Puzzle game, developed and published by Acorn User, which was released in Europe in 1997.

software.name: MiG-29 Fulcrum
software.Description: So you want to be a combat pilot... Well, here's your chance to fly the Soviet Union's MiG-29 Fulcrum - probably the best fighter aircraft in the world. After years of research and development, Simis have produced a simulation which combines the thrills of combat with an unprecedentedly high level of unique and accurate detail. You will have to prove your skills in a series of gruelling missions based on real-life scenarios. MiG-29 is the ultimate military aviation experience which will test and stretch your skills like nothing before.

software.name: Moonquake
software.Description: Moonquake is a Puzzle game, developed and published by Archimedes World, which was released in Europe in 1992.

software.name: Mr Doo
software.Description: Mr Doo is a Puzzle game, developed and published by Archimedes World, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Nebulus
software.Description: Nebulus is an Action game, developed by Hewson and published by Krisalis Software, which was released in Europe in 1987.

software.name: Nevryon
software.Description: Nevryon is an Action game, developed and published by 4th Dimension, which was released in Europe in 1990.

software.name: Oddball
software.Description: Oddball is an Action game, developed and published by Digital Psychosis, which was released in Europe in 1995.

software.name: Oh, No! More Lemmings!
software.Description: Oh, No! More Lemmings! is a Puzzle game, developed by DMA Design and published by Krisalis Software, which was released in Europe in 1992.

software.name: Pac-Mania
software.Description: You know Pac-Man, that world-famous, dot-munchin', maze-runnin' yella fella who's full of fun and frenzy. Now you can play Pac-Man like you've never played before - in spectacular 3-D! In Pac-Mania, everything on the screen comes alive! The lovable ghosts glide through the air. Dots and energizer pellets hang in midair. Pac-Man gets a new power: He can jump up and over ghosts! There's also a Pac Booster feature that lets you move Pac-Man at superspeed. You'll love the new challenging mazes - they come in so many mind-boggling shapes, they'll turn you into a certified Pac-Maniac!

software.name: Pandora's Box
software.Description: Pandora's Box is an Action game, developed and published by 4th Dimension, which was released in Europe in 1991.

software.name: Paradroid 2000
software.Description: Paradroid 2000 is an Action game, developed by Hewson and published by Coin-Age, which was released in Europe in 1985.

software.name: Pawn, The
software.Description: Set in the mythical world of Kerovnia, this amusing and complex tale is subtle enough to appeal to the beginner and hardened adventurer alike. A revolutionary text-handling system allows input of complicated sentences and complete interaction with characters (including some very intelligent animals!). The Pawn represents all its characters and objects as if they existed in a real world, storing complex information about their attributes and properties linked to their particular position or context in the game. Your objectives are manyfold: The simplest is to escape from Kerovnia, but you will find others as you wander about the land and communicate with the characters you meet. The Pawn combines a rich text adventure with stunning color graphics and a language parser that will set the standards for years to come!

software.name: Phaethon
software.Description: Phaethon is a Racing game, developed and published by System Interrupt, which was released in Europe in 1993.

software.name: Pipemania
software.Description: Pipemania is a Puzzle game, developed by The Assembly Line and published by Empire Interactive, which was released in Europe in 1990.

software.name: Play it again Sam 2
software.Description: Play it again Sam 2 is a Miscellaneous game, developed and published by Superior Software, which was released in Europe in 1993.

software.name: Poizone
software.Description: Poizone is an Action game, developed by ArcAngels and published by Eterna, which was released in Europe in 1991.

software.name: Populous
software.Description: The power of light or the force of darkness? You decide! The Ice World - One of the four totally different landscapes. Use Nature's Creations - Swamps, earthquakes or volcanoes... at your fingertips. The desert is a hostile territory - can you populate it? Your skill gives you the power.

software.name: Powerband
software.Description: Powerband is a Racing game, developed and published by 4th Dimension, which was released in Europe in 1990.

software.name: Quark
software.Description: Quark is an Action game, developed and published by Oregan Software Developments, which was released in Europe in 1993.

software.name: Ravenskull
software.Description: Ravenskull is an Adventure game, developed and published by Superior Software, which was released in Europe in 1997.

software.name: Repton 3
software.Description: Repton 3 is a Puzzle game, developed by Superior Software and published by ProAction, which was released in Europe in 1988.

software.name: Repton 4: Ego
software.Description: Repton 4: Ego is a Puzzle game, developed and published by Superior Software, which was released in Europe in 1992.

software.name: Rick Dangerous
software.Description: Rick Dangerous is an Action game, developed and published by Hitmen Software, which was released in Europe in 1995.

software.name: Saloon Cars Deluxe
software.Description: Saloon Cars Deluxe is a Racing game, developed and published by 4th Dimension, which was released in Europe in 1992.

software.name: Sensible Soccer
software.Description: Sensible Soccer is a Sports game, developed by Sensible Software and published by Renegade, which was released in Europe in 1992.

software.name: SimCity
software.Description: With SIMCITY, take the destiny of the world's greatest cities in hand. Build houses, streets, factories, airports, and a stadium. You will have to fight crime and pollution, collect taxes and balance your budget. Everything is managed and animated in real time. Every decision influences instantly the life of your town. You will face crises, natural disasters (tornadoes, earthquakes, etc.), but - who knows - maybe one day you will finally get the city of your dreams. SIMCITY is an all-absorbing and unique game. It contains 8 pre-defined scenarios: e.g. San Francisco, Tokyo, Rio de Janeiro... But of course, you're free to plan your own city!

software.name: SimCity 2000
software.Description: SimCity 2000 puts an entire city in the palm of your hand. SimCity 2000 lets you create, build, and run a city of your own. Take on the role as a mayor and call the shots for the entire city. You'll have to keep up on the housing, industries, mass transportation, and commerce to attract potential citizens. And just when you think you have it under control, a natural disaster or alien invasion may occur to set you back. However, if you can conquer all of these problems, you just might be able to turn a small town into a thriving metropolis.

software.name: Simon the Sorcerer
software.Description: Simon the Sorcerer is an Adventure game, developed by Eclipse and published by GamesWare, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Small
software.Description: Small is a Puzzle game, developed and published by Virgo Software, which was released in Europe in 1993.

software.name: Speedball
software.Description: Speedball is a Sports game, developed by The Bitmap Brothers and published by Krisalis Software, which was released in Europe in 1988.

software.name: Speedball 2: Brutal Deluxe
software.Description: It's two years since the last ball was thrown on a Speedball pitch. There are new teams, new stadia and new rules. The arena is bigger, the players are tougher and the action is faster than ever before. The challenge is this: Take control of Brutal Deluxe, the worst team in Speedball history, and turn them into champions!

software.name: Star Fighter 3000
software.Description: Star Fighter 3000 is an Action game, developed and published by Fednet Software, which was released in Europe in 1994.

software.name: Starch
software.Description: Starch is an Action game, developed by Alien Images and published by Archimedes World, which was released in Europe in 1990.

software.name: Super Pool
software.Description: Super Pool is a Sports game, developed and published by 4th Dimension, which was released in Europe in 1991.

software.name: SWIV
software.Description: SWIV is an Action game, developed and published by Krisalis Software, which was released in Europe in 1992.

software.name: Sylvia Lane
software.Description: Sylvia Lane is an Adventure game, developed and published by 4th Dimension, which was released in Europe in 1993.

software.name: Talisman
software.Description: Talisman is an Action Adventure game, developed and published by Minerva, which was released in Europe in 1989.

software.name: Tanks
software.Description: Tanks is a Strategy game, developed and published by Werewolf Software, which was released in Europe in 1996.

software.name: Terramex
software.Description: Become one of the world's five most reputable explorers and experience the hazards of a dangerous journey to find Professor Eyestrain and deflect the meteor to which only he has the solution. Addictive, compelling and spiced with endless hours of zany humor and brilliant graphics and animation.

software.name: Top Bananna
software.Description: Top Bananna is an Action game, developed by Hex and published by Psycore, which was released in Europe in 1991.

software.name: Tower of Babel
software.Description: Tower of Babel is an intricate 3D strategy game involving an interconnecting network of towers, platforms and lifts all rendered in solid 3D with innovative light and shading techniques. Take control of robot spiders and program them to solve problems and puzzles and interact with other creatures such as Pushers, Zappers and Grabbers. Alternatively, real-time control is available to you at any time for instantaneous reaction to the game's developments. For the more adventurous among you, there is a complete game designer, allowing the construction of your own series of towers, platforms and lifts. Attempt to fox your friends with your own fiendishly difficult creations. More than just a game, more than just a puzzle - Tower of Babel is a whole new concept in strategy gaming!

software.name: Twinworld
software.Description: Twinworld is an Action game, developed by Blue Byte and published by Cygnus, which was released in Europe in 1989.

software.name: UIM
software.Description: UIM is a Simulation game, developed and published by 4th Dimension, which was released in Europe in 1990.

software.name: WIMP Game, The
software.Description: The WIMP Game is an Action game, developed and published by 4th Dimension, which was released in Europe in 1990.

software.name: Wolfenstein 3D
software.Description: Achtung! You are OSA super agent B.J. Blazkowicz. Your goal is to escape from Castle Wolfenstein and defeat the twisted Nazi regime in Wolfenstein 3D. Fight all of the memorable enemies from Hans Grosse to Mecha-Hitler in the legendary game that launched the first-person shooter genre. Search classic levels for hidden secrets revealing stolen Nazi treasure, health packs, ammo and weapons, or even short cuts.

software.name: Xenon 2: Megablast
software.Description: The Xenites are back and the very fabric of time is in danger. Five time bombs have been planted at various points throughout history. Only you can save the day, not to mention the universe! Featuring ground-breaking graphics, digitized Bomb the Bass soundtrack, 1 or 2 competitive player option, and 5 vertically-scrolling parallax levels.

software.name: XOR
software.Description: XOR is a Puzzle game, developed by Astral and published by Acorn User, which was released in Europe in 1996.

software.name: Zarch
software.Description: Zarch is an Action game, developed by Elite and published by Superior Software, which was released in Europe in 1987.

software.name: Zool: Ninja of the ''Nth'' Dimension
software.Description: Once every year, the games world is rocked by a game so stunning, so fast, so colorful, so big, so demanding, so mega, so awesome, so varied , so incredible, and so full of fabulous features and unexpected treats, that everybody just looks at it and says "THAT'S IT!" This year, ZOOL, THE NINJA FROM THE Nth DIMENSION, is definitely "IT!"
